value:
$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Heh... There you are, Summoner.
How predictable of you.$k$pNow let's not mince words: DIE!
This land will be ours!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Ótr! Listen to me! We've just come
back from the Tower of Niðavellir.
There's something I must ask you!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|...What? Did you go inside?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|We did. And after what we learned,
I've been thinking that...maybe Fáfnir
isn't from Niðavellir after all.$k$pOr did you know that already, Ótr?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...Yes, things are just as you say.$k$pAnd now that you know that, all the
more reason for me to end your lives
here and now!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ótr, wait! What were you and Eitri
planning?! I need to know!$k$pIs there some connection to Fáfnir's
true origins?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|That is my concern, and mine alone!$k$pYou lot... Always prying, digging into
others' affairs. I'll show you where
you belong! Beneath my heel!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_総選挙マリアンヌ,ch17_24_Marianne_F_ELECTION01,Face|Please, Goddess... Lend me the
courage I need...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...Damn it! I have to retreat. I'll pull
back and regroup with Fáfnir.$k$p$EFace|...Where have you gotten to, Brother?$k$p
